body:
AppVeyor daily build failed for the past a few days. The `[feature]` CI build fails with the same test failures. PS team will have someone investigate the failures.
```
TEST FAILURES
Description: Configuration name should be in the transcript header
Name:        JEA session Transcript script test.Configuration name should be in the transcript header
message:
Cannot bind argument to parameter 'Path' because it is null.
stack-trace:
at <ScriptBlock>, C:\projects\powershell\test\powershell\engine\Remoting\RemoteSession.Basic.Tests.ps1: line 45
45:             $header = Get-Content $headerFile | Out-String
Description: Error occurred in Describe block
Name:        Implicit remoting on restricted ISS.Error occurred in Describe block
message:
Expected a value, but got $null or empty.
stack-trace:
At C:\projects\powershell\src\powershell-win-core\bin\Release\netcoreapp2.0\win7-x64\publish\Modules\Pester\4.3.1\Functions\Assertions\Should.ps1:206 char:9
+         throw ( New-ShouldErrorRecord -Message $testResult.FailureMes ...
Description: Verifies that Import-PSSession works on a restricted session
Name:        Import-PSSession on Restricted Session.Verifies that Import-PSSession works on a restricted session
message:
Cannot validate argument on parameter 'Session'. The argument is null. Provide a valid value for the argument, and then try running the command again.
stack-trace:
at <ScriptBlock>, C:\projects\powershell\test\powershell\Modules\Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility\Implicit.Remoting.Tests.ps1: line 2088
2088:                 $module = Import-PSSession -Session $session -AllowClobber -ErrorVariable $errorVariable -CommandName Get-Help
```
